ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 42
ygData.msgSnippet: Time to revisit Akanon I think.  Maybe the guy down by the mines of malfunction?  Also he probably meant that collapsable fishing poles fit in small
ygData.messageBody:
Time to revisit Akanon I think. Maybe the guy down by the mines of
malfunction? Also he probably meant that collapsable fishing poles fit in
small containers. You cannot fit a large fishing pole into one of these.

Dave Turner wrote:

> From: "Dave Turner" <dhtudo@...>
>
> Hi, I an a fisher and just have to tell you that regular fishing poles fit
> in backpacks already right now. This is just my guess but maybe I was
> thinking that the collapsable ones weighed less or maybe couldn't break.
> They would have to have some improvement over the regular ones right now...
> but being able to fit in backpacks wouldn't be it. See ya
>
> -Nazmir-
> 17th wizard on Povar
>
